data.title: Special Sauce
data.text:
Great little spot for a quick bite to eat.  I had a beef dog with onions and special sauce with a soft drink for $6.  The special sauce was something like a thin, sweet barbecue sauce and was delicious.  I like the way they criss-cross cut the dogs when cooking them.  It makes them much easier to eat.

Would recommend.

data.title: Fantastic hotdog! Don't miss the special sauce!
data.text: J Dawgs' hot dogs are absolutely spectacular. One can choose from either beef or Polish. Condiments are added to the customer's specifications. However, my advice is to try the special sauce as it is absolutely fantastic! The hotdog, chips, and drink combo cost only seven dollars… A real bargain!! In addition, the service is incredibly fast. From the time that I queued up until I received my food was approximately two minutes, and this was even at noon time. This restaurant is very convenient to the businesses, tourist attractions, and hotels in the downtown Salt Lake City area.

data.title: Loved the dawgs, loved the atmosphere
data.text: This was an excellent restaurant. I love the concept. The food was good. The people were friendly. The atmosphere was good. The building was clean. The locations was convenient. The price was right.
